overview: The second of two Military Dorm installations brings us back into a fantasy of hot, fighting men. Some of the studs from the first film reappear in this second but there are a bevy of super sexy new studs to look at as well. These guys have a lot of cock between them and they know how to drive it. There’s not a moment to waste while watching all the hot and sweaty fucking in bunks and under the shower. Sometimes when you watch these movies, if you are like me, you wonder just what the pay must be like for a fluffer.
title: Military Dorm 2
